name: Office Intruder
description:
The game is made for game jam!

Office Intruder is a game in which you have to take the role of an employee who hates the rules of his office, and with the help of scotch tape in every possible way to break them!

Background:

Exhausted by work, you decide to drink a cup of coffee, but it breaks, and the only thing that comes to your mind is to glue it with tape. But suddenly, your office is locked and the only way to get out of it is to break the rules.

Control:

WASD - Walk.

LMB - Use object.

RMB - Drop object.

E - Interaction.

Space - Jump.

Ctrl - Crouch.

1 - Slot with an object.

2 - Slot with electrical tape.

3 - Slot with adhesive tape.
